name: Tableau and Tanks
description:
The theme for the paint jam 2020 is 'Tableau I'.

The idea was to have a multiplayer game (up to 4) and each one could fire each other. The bullet trail would make strong lines and when they make a square, it would fill with the player color. The one with more colors in the canvas win. You would be able to steal a square and hit other tanks. Unfortunately, I managed bad my time and could delivery only half of the features (with Bugs, I know). 

That been said, I had fun! =) 

Very neat idea to have the art been done with paint. I liked to make sounds with mouth and to design the tanks. Thank you for this game jam.

The game is project is here: https://gitlab.com/z3r0_th/paint-jam-2020
